pkgmetadata.longdescription: rangedict is a dict whose key is a range.Usage----- >>> from rangedict import RangeDict >>> rd = RangeDict() >>> rd[(1, 2)] = 1 >>> rd[(3, 3)] = 3 >>> rd[(5, 7)] = 5 >>> print rd[6] 5 >>> 3 in rd True >>> del rd[(3, 3)] >>> 3 in rd FalseImplemented based on red black tree provides an O(logn) complexity forinserting, deleting and finding.
